channel.title: Projects on Sam Jett
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sam Jett

item.title: Microstructural Imaging
item.description: Quantifying the orientation and spread of collagen fibers in tissue through a polarization-based imaging system.

item.title: Student Teacher Evaluation Visualization (STEV) at OU
item.description: Built a web app to allow students to visualize OU course evaluations and professor reviews.

item.title: Commuter App
item.description: Created a web app to help people plan their daily commute.

item.title: Website for Organic Accessories
item.description: I developed a static website using the Hugo framework to help market for Organic Accessories, my mother’s business.

item.title: Biomechanics and Biomaterials Design Lab
item.description: A link to the homepage of the Biomechanics and Biomaterials Design Lab.

item.title: Heart Valve Biaxial Mechanical Testing
item.description: Characterizing the mechanics of heart valve leaflet tissue through biaxial mechanical testing.

item.title: Wind Tunnel Development
item.description: Developing a robust and low-cost wind tunnel for student research use at the University of Oklahoma.
